availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, butcher. South Carolina native. Married to Martha Smith. Father of Amelia Smith and Edward Smith. Grocer in Louisville in 1850. Butcher in Louisville in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 103A
Henry Tanner, comp., Tanner's Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861, (Louisville, KY: Directory Publication and Advertising Agency, 1861), 230.
